title: Deforestation Over Time
description: The image shows a comparison of satellite images from two different years, 1985 and 2000, highlighting the changes in land use over time. The top half displays a more forested area with fewer clearings, while the bottom half reveals significant deforestation, with numerous cleared patches indicating agricultural or urban development.

title: Capercaillie
description: A male capercaillie, a large bird known for its distinctive plumage and courtship display. The bird is shown standing on a grassy area, with its tail feathers fanned out and a colorful head featuring a red wattle.
